results.name: Expansion of (3 * phi(-x^36) - phi(-x^4)) / 2 - x * f(-x^24) in powers of x where phi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of phi(-x^36) - x * f(-x^24) + x^4 * f(-x^12, -x^60) in powers of x where phi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions.
Expansion of f(-x^9, x^9) - x * f(-x^3, x^15) in powers of x where f() is the two variable Ramanujan theta function.
mathematica: a[n_]:= SeriesCoefficient[(3*EllipticTheta[3, 0, -q^36] -EllipticTheta[3, 0, -q^4])/2 - q*QPochhammer[q^24, q^72]*QPochhammer[q^48, q^72]* QPochhammer[q^72, q^72], {q, 0, n}]; Table[a[n], {n,0,100}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 19 2017 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jan 20 2012
